capabilities.name: start_codegen_session
capabilities.description: Start a new code generation session to record Playwright actions

capabilities.name: end_codegen_session
capabilities.description: End a code generation session and generate the test file

capabilities.name: get_codegen_session
capabilities.description: Get information about a code generation session

capabilities.name: clear_codegen_session
capabilities.description: Clear a code generation session without generating a test

capabilities.name: playwright_navigate
capabilities.description: Navigate to a URL

capabilities.name: playwright_screenshot
capabilities.description: Take a screenshot of the current page or a specific element

capabilities.name: playwright_click
capabilities.description: Click an element on the page

capabilities.name: playwright_iframe_click
capabilities.description: Click an element in an iframe on the page

capabilities.name: playwright_fill
capabilities.description: fill out an input field

capabilities.name: playwright_select
capabilities.description: Select an element on the page with Select tag

capabilities.name: playwright_hover
capabilities.description: Hover an element on the page

capabilities.name: playwright_evaluate
capabilities.description: Execute JavaScript in the browser console

capabilities.name: playwright_console_logs
capabilities.description: Retrieve console logs from the browser with filtering options

capabilities.name: playwright_close
capabilities.description: Close the browser and release all resources

capabilities.name: playwright_get
capabilities.description: Perform an HTTP GET request

capabilities.name: playwright_post
capabilities.description: Perform an HTTP POST request

capabilities.name: playwright_put
capabilities.description: Perform an HTTP PUT request

capabilities.name: playwright_patch
capabilities.description: Perform an HTTP PATCH request

capabilities.name: playwright_delete
capabilities.description: Perform an HTTP DELETE request

capabilities.name: playwright_expect_response
capabilities.description: Ask Playwright to start waiting for a HTTP response. This tool initiates the wait operation but does not wait for its completion.

capabilities.name: playwright_assert_response
capabilities.description: Wait for and validate a previously initiated HTTP response wait operation.

capabilities.name: playwright_custom_user_agent
capabilities.description: Set a custom User Agent for the browser

capabilities.name: playwright_get_visible_text
capabilities.description: Get the visible text content of the current page

capabilities.name: playwright_get_visible_html
capabilities.description: Get the HTML content of the current page

capabilities.name: playwright_go_back
capabilities.description: Navigate back in browser history

capabilities.name: playwright_go_forward
capabilities.description: Navigate forward in browser history

capabilities.name: playwright_drag
capabilities.description: Drag an element to a target location

capabilities.name: playwright_press_key
capabilities.description: Press a keyboard key

capabilities.name: playwright_save_as_pdf
capabilities.description: Save the current page as a PDF file
